DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study compare efficacy safety Metvix® natural daylight photodynamic therapy Metvix® conventional photodynamic therapy subject mild actinic keratoses ( intra-individual comparison )
DOC.brief_title: Actinic Keratoses Treatment With Metvix® Combination With Light
DOC.criteria: Male female 18 year ; Subject clinical diagnosis mild Actinic Keratosis ( AK ) face scalp without clinical diagnosis moderate AK target area ( TAs ) ; Subject clinical diagnosis least one severe AK TAs Subject clinical diagnosis skin disease ( include nonmelanoma skin cancer ) TAs ; Subject pigment AK TAs
